===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ゆうれい}} compound {{m|zh|幽靈|tr=ʔjiw leng|lit=dark + supernatural}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''yōulíng'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''iu-lêng''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ゆうれい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|kyu=幽靈|ゆうれい|hhira=いうれい}}

# a [[ghost]], a [[phantom]]
